solution_line_template: Martha had {bottles_pantry} bottles of juice in the pantry + {bottles_refrigerator} bottles in the refrigerator = <<{bottles_pantry}+{bottles_refrigerator}={initial_bottles}>>{initial_bottles} bottles of juice.

After Martha went shopping she added {bottles_bought} bottles of juice to the + {initial_bottles} bottles she already had = <<{bottles_bought}+{initial_bottles}={total_bottles}>>{total_bottles} bottles of juice.

Martha and her family drank {bottles_drank} bottles of juice during the week from the {total_bottles} they had, {total_bottles} - {bottles_drank} = <<{total_bottles}-{bottles_drank}={bottles_left}>>{bottles_left} bottles left.
